title: Handle Aircraft Towing
description: An aircraft needs to be towed from a maintenance hangar to a departure gate. A ground crew member must manage the operation.

tasks.description: Request permission from airport ground control to tow the aircraft along a specific route.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives clearance from ground control.

tasks.description: Attach the towbar and tug to the aircraft's nose gear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures the equipment is securely attached.

tasks.description: Tow the aircraft to the designated gate, ensuring wing walkers are present to prevent collisions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The aircraft is safely towed to the gate.
